Craftman.title: Passionate Software Craftsman
Craftman.passionate: As a passionate developer, I create clean and simple code that is easy to test and maintain.
Craftman.details: I firmly believe in the <2>Software craftsmanship</2> philosophy to deliver work with the minimal technical debt possible, on which you can confidently evolve for the rest of your project.

HeroExperience.devAndEngeneering: years of experience in development and engineering
HeroExperience.independant: years as an independent web developer working on your projects

Frontend.dailyReact: I have worked on React projects for the last height years, making it my front-end technology of choice.
Frontend.variety: I was able to evolve on a wide variety of new or legacy code with class or function components, HOCs, Render Props, and Hooks.
Frontend.svelte: Recently I also had the opportunity to work on Svelte and SvelteKit projects.
Frontend.lookingForward: Whatever your request, I would be happy to produce your next web application, reduce your technical debt or reinforce a team already in place.

Services.title: Services
Services.description: With 14+ years of engineering, I can work in different domains of expertise. Thus, I can strengthen your team in a specific part of your application or as a full-stack developer on your entire application.

HomePage.title: Damien Monni - Web developer remotely working everywhere.
